testcase.name: testQueryCityWorkList

error.message: ### Error querying database. Cause: java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: Table 'covid19.tb_city_work' doesn't exist ### The error may exist in file [D:\covid19\target\classes\mapper\CityWorkDao.xml] ### The error may involve com.sgg.covid19.dao.CityWorkDao.queryCityWork-Inline ### The error occurred while setting parameters ### SQL: SELECT date, city, rate FROM tb_city_work ### Cause: java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: Table 'covid19.tb_city_work' doesn't exist ; bad SQL grammar []; nested exception is java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: Table 'covid19.tb_city_work' doesn't exist
